genericInterface.cc

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 /*
00002  * =====================================================================================
00003  *
00004  *       Filename: \file genericInterface.cc
00005  *
00006  *    Description: \brief This file has all the implementation for the
00007  *    GenericInterface class. It implements a thin interface layer that
00008  *    converts between high level and low level packets and outputs flits to a
00009  *    router. The model is suited for use with a physical router and does not
00010  *    handle virtual channels.
00011  *
00012  *        Version:  1.0
00013  *        Created:  02/21/2010 03:46:20 PM
00014  *       Revision:  none
00015  *       Compiler:  gcc
00016  *
00017  *         Author:  Mitchelle Rasquinha (), mitchelle.rasquinha@gatech.edu
00018  *        Company:  Georgia Institute of Technology
00019  *
00020  * =====================================================================================
00021  */
00022

00031 GenericInterface::GenericInterface ()
00032 {
00033     name = "Interface";
00034     ticking =false;
00035 }               /* -----  end of function GenericInterface::GenericInterface  ----- */

00037 GenericInterface::~GenericInterface ()
00038 {
00039     in_packets.clear();
00040     out_packets.clear();
00041 
00042 }               /* -----  end of function GenericInterface::~GenericInterface  ----- */

00044 void
00045 GenericInterface::setup (uint v, uint cr)
00046 {
00047     vcs =v;
00048     int credits = cr;
00049     /* All this is part of the init */
00050     address = myId();
00051     //    convert_packet_cycles = DEFAULT_CONVERT_PACKET_CYCLES;
00052 
00053     vector <uint>::iterator itr = find(mc_positions.begin(), mc_positions.end(), node_ip);
00054     if ( itr != mc_positions.end())
00055         is_for_mc = true;
00056     else
00057         is_for_mc = false;
00058 
00059     in_packet_complete = false;
00060     in_buffer.resize(vcs, buffer_size);
00061     out_buffer.resize(vcs, buffer_size);
00062     downstream_credits.resize(vcs);
00063 
00064     out_packet_flit_index.resize(vcs);
00065     in_ready.resize(vcs);
00066     in_packets_flit_index.resize(vcs);
00067 
00068     in_packets.resize(vcs);
00069     in_packets_valid.resize(vcs);
00070     out_packets.resize(vcs);
00071 
00072 
00073     for ( uint i=0; i<vcs ; i++ )
00074     {
00075         out_packet_flit_index[i] = 0;
00076         in_ready[i] = true;
00077         in_packets[i].destination = address;
00078         in_packets[i].virtual_channel = i;
00079         in_packets[i].length= 10;
00080         downstream_credits[i] = credits;
00081     }
00082 
00083     /*  init stats */
00084     packets_out = 0;
00085     flits_out = 0;
00086     packets_in = 0;
00087     flits_in = 0;
00088     total_packets_in_time = 0;
00089 
00090     /* Init complete */
00091 
00092     /* Send a ready event for each vc 
00093        for ( uint i=0 ; i<vcs ; i++ )
00094        {
00095        IrisEvent* event = new IrisEvent();
00096        in_packets[i].virtual_channel = i;
00097        VirtualChannelDescription* vc = new VirtualChannelDescription();
00098        vc->vc = i;
00099        event->event_data.push_back(vc);
00100        event->type = READY_EVENT;
00101        event->vc = i;
00102        Simulator::Schedule(Simulator::Now(),&NetworkComponent::process_event, processor_connection, event); 
00103        }
00104      */
00105 
00106     return;
00107 }               /* -----  end of function GenericInterface::setup  ----- */

00136 string
00137 GenericInterface::toString () const
00138 {
00139     stringstream str;
00140     str << "GenericInterface: "
00141         << "\t VC: " << out_packets.size()
00142         << "\t address: " << address << " node_ip: " << node_ip
00143         << "\t OutputBuffers: " << out_buffer.toString()
00144         << "\t InputBuffer: " << in_buffer.toString()
00145         ;
00146     return str.str();
00147 }               /* -----  end of function GenericInterface::toString  ----- */

00149 void
00150 GenericInterface::process_event(IrisEvent* e)
00151 {
00152     switch(e->type)
00153     {
00154         case READY_EVENT:
00155             handle_ready_event(e);
00156             break;
00157 
00158         case LINK_ARRIVAL_EVENT:
00159             handle_link_arrival(e);
00160             break;
00161 
00162         case NEW_PACKET_EVENT:
00163             handle_new_packet_event(e);
00164             break;
00165 
00166         case TICK_EVENT:
00167             handle_tick_event(e);
00168             break;
00169 
00170         default:
00171             cout << "**Unkown event exception! " << e->type << endl;
00172             break;
00173     }
00174 }               /* -----  end of function GenericInterface::process_event ----- */
00175 
00176 void
00177 GenericInterface::handle_ready_event( IrisEvent* e)
00178 {
00183 #ifdef _DEBUG_INTERFACE
00184     _DBG(" handle_ready_event %d ", e->vc);
00185 #endif
00186 
00187     in_ready[0] = true;
00188     if(!ticking)
00189     { 
00190         ticking = true;
00191         IrisEvent* event = new IrisEvent();
00192         event->type = TICK_EVENT;
00193         event->vc = 0 ; //e->vc;
00194         Simulator::Schedule( floor(Simulator::Now())+1, &NetworkComponent::process_event, this, event);
00195     }
00196 
00197     delete e;
00198     return;
00199 }               /* -----  end of function GenericInterface::handle_ready_event  ----- */
00200 
00201 void
00202 GenericInterface::handle_link_arrival ( IrisEvent* e)
00203 {
00204     //Find out if it was a flit or a credit
00205     LinkArrivalData* uptr = static_cast<LinkArrivalData* >(e->event_data.at(0));
00206 
00207     if(uptr->type == FLIT_ID)
00208     {
00209         flits_in++;
00210         in_buffer.change_push_channel(0);
00211         in_buffer.push(uptr->ptr);
00212         if( uptr->ptr->type == TAIL )
00213         {
00214             packets_in++;
00215             total_packets_in_time += (ullint)(ceil(Simulator::Now() - 
00216                                                    static_cast<TailFlit*>(uptr->ptr)->packet_originated_time));
00217             static_cast<TailFlit*>(uptr->ptr)->avg_network_latency = ceil(Simulator::Now());
00218             if ( is_for_mc)
00219             {
00220                 _DBG("R->MInt %lld",packets_in);
00221             }
00222             else
00223             {
00224                 _DBG("R->Int %lld",packets_in);
00225             }
00226         }
00227 #ifdef _DEBUG_INTERFACE
00228         _DBG(" handle_link_arrival FLIT ticking: %d type: %d type: %d", uptr->type, ticking, uptr->ptr->type);
00229 #endif
00230 
00231         if( uptr->ptr->is_single_flit_pkt )
00232         {
00233             packets_in++;
00234             total_packets_in_time += (ullint)(Simulator::Now() - static_cast<HeadFlit*>(uptr->ptr)->packet_originated_time);
00235             static_cast<HeadFlit*>(uptr->ptr)->avg_network_latency = ceil(Simulator::Now())-static_cast<HeadFlit*>(uptr->ptr)->avg_network_latency;
00236             if ( is_for_mc)
00237             {
00238                 _DBG("R->MInt %lld",packets_in);
00239             }
00240             else
00241             {
00242                 _DBG("R->Int %lld",packets_in);
00243             }
00244         }
00245         uptr->valid = false;
00246 
00247         if( !(uptr->ptr->type == TAIL || uptr->ptr->is_single_flit_pkt))
00248         {
00249             LinkArrivalData* arrival = new LinkArrivalData();
00250             arrival->vc = 0;
00251             arrival->type = CREDIT_ID;
00252             IrisEvent* event = new IrisEvent();
00253             event->type = LINK_ARRIVAL_EVENT;
00254             event->vc = 0;
00255             event->event_data.push_back(arrival);
00256             event->src_id = address;
00257             if(do_two_stage_router)
00258                 Simulator::Schedule( floor(Simulator::Now())+0.75, 
00259                                      &NetworkComponent::process_event, static_cast<GenericLink*>(input_connection)->input_connection, event);
00260             else
00261                 Simulator::Schedule( floor(Simulator::Now())+1.75, 
00262                                      &NetworkComponent::process_event, static_cast<GenericLink*>(input_connection)->input_connection, event);
00263 
00264         }
00265     }
00266     else if ( uptr->type == CREDIT_ID)
00267     {
00268         downstream_credits[uptr->vc]++;
00269 #ifdef _DEBUG_INTERFACE
00270         _DBG(" got a credit vc: %d ftype: %d no_of_credits: %d ", uptr->vc, uptr->type, downstream_credits[uptr->vc] );
00271 #endif
00272     }
00273     else
00274     {
00275         cout << "Exception: Unk link arrival data type! " << endl;
00276     }
00277 
00278     if(!ticking)
00279     {
00280         ticking = true;
00281         IrisEvent* new_event = new IrisEvent();
00282         new_event->type = TICK_EVENT;
00283         new_event->vc = e->vc;
00284         Simulator::Schedule( floor(Simulator::Now())+1, &GenericInterface::process_event, this, new_event);
00285     }
00286     delete uptr;
00287     delete e;
00288     return;
00289 }               /* -----  end of function GenericInterface::handle_link_arrival  ----- */
00290 
00291 void
00292 GenericInterface::handle_new_packet_event(IrisEvent* e)
00293 {
00294     HighLevelPacket* pkt = static_cast<HighLevelPacket*>(e->event_data.at(0));
00295     if( out_packets[0].size() !=0 )
00296     {
00297         cout << "Error got new pkt when old not emptied" << endl;
00298         exit(1);
00299     }
00300     pkt->to_low_level_packet(&out_packets[0]);
00301     if ( is_for_mc)
00302     {
00303         _DBG("P->MInt %lld",packets_in);
00304     }
00305     else
00306     {
00307         _DBG("P->Int %lld",packets_in);
00308     }
00309 
00310     delete pkt;
00311 
00312     out_packet_flit_index[ pkt->virtual_channel ] = 0;
00313 
00314 #ifdef _DEBUG_INTERFACE
00315     _DBG("handle_new_packet_event vc: %d ", static_cast<unsigned int >(pkt->virtual_channel) );
00316 #endif
00317 
00318     if( !ticking)
00319     {
00320         ticking = true;
00321         IrisEvent* event = new IrisEvent();
00322         event->type = TICK_EVENT;
00323         event->vc = e->vc;
00324         Simulator::Schedule(floor(Simulator::Now())+1, &NetworkComponent::process_event, this, event);
00325     }
00326 
00327     delete e;
00328     return;
00329 }               /* -----  end of function GenericInterface::handle_new_packet_event  ----- */

00331 void
00332 GenericInterface::handle_tick_event(IrisEvent* e)
00333 {
00334     ticking = false;
00335     /*---------- This is on the output side. From processor out to network --------- */
00336     if( downstream_credits[0]>0 && out_buffer.get_occupancy(0)>0
00337         && in_packet_complete )
00338     {
00339         Flit* f;
00340         bool send_flit = true;
00341         out_buffer.change_pull_channel(0);
00342         /* Needed for adaptive VCS and ensures the check for one msg per input
00343          * port of a router. However in DOR with packets of variable length
00344          * this leads to poor buffer utilization. Hence removing.*/
00345         f= out_buffer.peek();
00346         if(!multiple_flit_in_buf && (f->type == HEAD  && downstream_credits[0] != credits))
00347             send_flit = false;
00348 
00349         if( send_flit )
00350         {
00351             IrisEvent* event = new IrisEvent();
00352             LinkArrivalData* arrival =  new LinkArrivalData();
00353             arrival->type = FLIT_ID;
00354             arrival->vc = 0;
00355             out_buffer.change_pull_channel(0);
00356             f = out_buffer.pull();
00357             downstream_credits[arrival->vc]--; 
00358 
00359             if ( f->type == HEAD )
00360                 static_cast<HeadFlit*>(f)->avg_network_latency = Simulator::Now() - static_cast<HeadFlit*>(f)->avg_network_latency;
00361 
00362             if (f->type == TAIL || ( f->is_single_flit_pkt) )
00363             {
00364                 packets_out++;
00365                 in_packet_complete = false;
00366 
00367                 IrisEvent* event = new IrisEvent();
00368                 event->type = READY_EVENT;
00369                 event->vc = 0;
00370                 Simulator::Schedule(floor(Simulator::Now())+1, &NetworkComponent::process_event, processor_connection, event);
00371                 if( is_for_mc)
00372                 {
00373                     _DBG("MInt->R pkts_out: %lld ",packets_out);
00374                 }
00375                 else
00376                 {
00377                     _DBG("Int->R pkts_out: %lld ",packets_out);
00378                 }
00379             }
00380             flits_out++;
00381 
00382             arrival->ptr = f;
00383 
00384             event->event_data.push_back(arrival);
00385             event->type = LINK_ARRIVAL_EVENT;
00386             event->src_id = address;
00387             event->vc = arrival->vc;
00388 
00389             ticking = true;
00390 
00391             if(do_two_stage_router)
00392                 Simulator::Schedule(Simulator::Now()+0.75, 
00393                                     &NetworkComponent::process_event, 
00394                                     static_cast<GenericLink*>(output_connection)->output_connection, event);
00395             else
00396                 Simulator::Schedule(Simulator::Now()+1.75, 
00397                                     &NetworkComponent::process_event, 
00398                                     static_cast<GenericLink*>(output_connection)->output_connection, event);
00399             static_cast<GenericLink*>(output_connection)->flits_passed++;
00400 #ifdef _DEBUG_INTERFACE
00401             _DBG(" FLIT_OUT_EVENT credits_now: %d fty:%d", downstream_credits[0], arrival->ptr->type);
00402 #endif
00403         }
00404     }
00405 
00406     //out packet to out buffer
00407     if ( out_packets[0].size() > 0 && out_packet_flit_index[0] < out_packets[0].length ) //&& out_buffer.get_occupancy(0)>0)
00408     {
00409         out_buffer.change_push_channel(0);
00410         Flit* ptr = out_packets[0].get_next_flit();
00411         out_buffer.push( ptr);
00412         out_packet_flit_index[0]++;
00413 
00414 #ifdef _DEBUG_INTERFACE
00415         _DBG("Flit->OutBuffer ftype:%d outpkt_len:%d index:%d OB_size: %d ",ptr->type, out_packets[0].length, out_packet_flit_index[0], out_buffer.get_occupancy(0));
00416 #endif
00417 
00418         if(out_packet_flit_index[0] == out_packets[0].length )
00419         {
00420             out_packet_flit_index[0] = 0;
00421             out_packets[0].flits.clear();
00422             in_packet_complete = true;
00423 
00424             /* 
00425                if( out_packets[0].size()<1)
00426                {
00427 
00428                IrisEvent* event = new IrisEvent();
00429                event->type = READY_EVENT;
00430                event->vc = 0;
00431                Simulator::Schedule(floor(Simulator::Now())+1, &NetworkComponent::process_event, processor_connection, event);
00432                }
00433              * */
00434 
00435         }
00436         ticking = true;
00437     }
00438 
00439 
00440     /*---------- This is on the input side. From processor out to ntwk --------- */
00441     // in packets to processor
00442 
00443     if ( in_ready[0]  && in_packets_flit_index[0]!=0 && in_packets_flit_index[0] == in_packets[0].length)
00444     {
00445         in_ready[0] = false;    
00446         HighLevelPacket* pkt = new HighLevelPacket();
00447         pkt->from_low_level_packet(&in_packets[0]);
00448         pkt->avg_network_latency = in_packets[0].avg_network_latency;
00449         pkt->hop_count = in_packets[0].hop_count;
00450         pkt->recv_time = (ullint)Simulator::Now();
00451         pkt->req_start_time = in_packets[0].req_start_time;
00452         pkt->waiting_in_ni = in_packets[0].waiting_in_ni;
00453 #ifdef _DEBUG_INTERFACE
00454         _DBG( "Interface got a complete llp: %s ", in_packets[0].toString().c_str());
00455         _DBG("converted it %s",pkt->toString().c_str());
00456 #endif
00457 
00458         /* 
00459            LowLevelPacket* llp = &in_packets[0];
00460            for( uint k=0; k<llp->flits.size(); k++)
00461            {
00462            for ( uint j=0;j<llp->flits[k]->phits.size() ;j++ )
00463            {
00464            llp->flits[k]->phits[j]->data.clear();
00465            delete (llp->flits[k]->phits[j]);
00466            }
00467            llp->flits[k]->phits.erase(llp->flits[k]->phits.begin(),llp->flits[k]->phits.end());
00468            llp->flits[k]->phits.clear();
00469            delete (llp->flits[k]);
00470            }
00471 
00472            llp->flits.erase(llp->flits.begin(),llp->flits.end());
00473            llp->flits.clear();
00474          * */
00475 
00476         in_packets_flit_index[0] = 0;
00477         IrisEvent* event = new IrisEvent();
00478         event->type = NEW_PACKET_EVENT;
00479         event->event_data.push_back(pkt);
00480         event->src_id = address;
00481         event->vc = 0;
00482         Simulator::Schedule(floor(Simulator::Now())+ 1, 
00483                             &NetworkComponent::process_event, processor_connection, event);
00484 
00485         LinkArrivalData* arrival = new LinkArrivalData();
00486         arrival->vc = 0;
00487         arrival->type = CREDIT_ID;
00488         IrisEvent* event2 = new IrisEvent();
00489         event2->type = LINK_ARRIVAL_EVENT;
00490         event2->vc = 0;
00491         event2->event_data.push_back(arrival);
00492         event2->src_id = address;
00493         if(do_two_stage_router)
00494             Simulator::Schedule( floor(Simulator::Now())+0.75, 
00495                                  &NetworkComponent::process_event, static_cast<GenericLink*>(input_connection)->input_connection, event2);
00496         else
00497             Simulator::Schedule( floor(Simulator::Now())+1.75, 
00498                                  &NetworkComponent::process_event, static_cast<GenericLink*>(input_connection)->input_connection, event2);
00499         ticking = true;
00500 #ifdef _DEBUG_INTERFACE
00501         _DBG("Packet to Processor. Sent credit back: %s", pkt->toString().c_str());
00502 #endif
00503 
00504     }
00505     else if ( !in_ready[0] && (in_packets_flit_index[0]!=0 && in_packets_flit_index[0] == in_packets[0].length))
00506     {
00507         ticking = true;
00508     }
00509 
00510     // arbitrate for the winner and push packets to in_buffer
00511     if( in_buffer.get_occupancy(0) > 0 && in_packets_flit_index[0] < in_packets[0].length )
00512     {
00513         in_buffer.change_pull_channel(0);
00514         Flit* ptr = in_buffer.pull();
00515         in_packets[0].add(ptr);
00516 
00517         in_packets_flit_index[0]++;
00518         ticking = true;
00519 #ifdef _DEBUG_INTERFACE
00520         _DBG("Inpush flit ftype:%d", ptr->type);
00521 #endif
00522         if( ptr->type == HEAD && static_cast<HeadFlit*>(ptr)->dst_address != node_ip)
00523         {
00524             _DBG("ERROR IncorrectDestinationException pkt_dest: %d node_ip: %d", in_packets[0].destination, node_ip); 
00525         }
00526 
00527     }
00528 
00529     if(ticking)
00530     {
00531         ticking = true;
00532         IrisEvent* new_event = new IrisEvent();
00533         new_event->type = TICK_EVENT;
00534         new_event->vc = e->vc;
00535         Simulator::Schedule( floor(Simulator::Now())+1, &GenericInterface::process_event, this, new_event);
00536     }
00537 
00538     delete e;
00539 }
00540 
00541 string
00542 GenericInterface::print_stats()
00543 {
00544     stringstream str;
00545     str << "\n interface[" << node_ip <<"] flits_in: " << flits_in
00546         << "\n interface[" << node_ip <<"] packets_in: " << packets_in
00547         << "\n interface[" << node_ip <<"] flits_out: " << flits_out
00548         << "\n interface[" << node_ip <<"] packets_out: " << packets_out
00549         << "\n interface[" << node_ip <<"] total_packet_latency(In packets): " << total_packets_in_time;
00550     if(packets_in != 0)
00551         str << "\n interface[" << node_ip <<"] avg_packet_latency(In packets): " << (total_packets_in_time+0.0)/packets_in
00552                                                                                      ;
00553     return str.str();
00554 
00555 }

00557 ullint
00558 GenericInterface::get_flits_out()
00559 {
00560     return flits_out;

00563 ullint
00564 GenericInterface::get_packets_out()

00566     return packets_out;

00569 ullint
00570 GenericInterface::get_packets()
00571 {
00572     return packets_out + packets_in;
00573 }
